name: Digimech
description:
Digimech, a fun hand-drawn 2D beat em' up with character customizability, astounding soundtracks, and crazy speed!

Controls
  • A & D : Move left and right
  • Space : Jump
  • Left-click : Kill enemies within range
Credits
  • Cai Jones
  • Émilie Fréchette
  • Étienne Ménard

A special thanks to Eden Sénécal-Lechasseur
